titleStmt.title: The vickers challenge claiming a maintainance as due by proofes out of the gospell : wherein is manifested, that there is a competencie due unto them / by Ios. Meene, vicker.
titleStmt.author: Meene, Joshua.

publicationStmt.publisher: Printed, and are to be sold by Nicholas Vavasour, at his shop in the Inner-Temple neere the church,

notesStmt.note: Another issue with cancelled t.p. of: A liberall maintenance is manifestly due to the ministers of the gospell.--Cf. STC (2nd ed.).
Signatures: [A]⁴ B-K⁴ L² (last leaf wanting or blank?).
Pages 63-64 (signature I4) bound out of order between pages 60 and 61.
Reproduction of original in the Harvard University Library.

place.placeName: his shop in the Inner-Temple neere the church
